data.what_is:
Splio  is  an  omnichannel  marketing  platform  that  combines marketing automation and loyalty marketing.

Splio  enables  marketers  to  manage  their  transactional  and relationship-based  loyalty  programs  online  and  offline,  as well  as  coordinate  powerful  marketing  campaigns  based  on  customer knowledge.

More  than  500  brands  around  the  world  use  Splio  every  day,  including  The  Kooples,  Kusmi  Tea,  Givenchy,  Le  Slip  Francais,  Caudalie,  Degrenne,  Intersport,  Longchamp,  Lindt,  Air  China,  and Cache Cache.
data.product_description: SPLIO offers an all-in-one marketing platform built for the needs of retailers that combines e-commerce and store sales for an optimal omni-commerce customer experience.
data.supported_languages: Catalan, German, English, French, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese, Spanish, Chinese (Simplified)

initial_reviews.review_title: Appreciate the workflows and automations | Superhelpful
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Splio?
As head of marketing at a startup, Splio was transformative. Its automation let us launch complex campaigns across channels with little manual work, shifting our focus to strategy and creativity. It was cost-effective, merging multiple tools into one and using analytics to guide our spending, maximizing our budget. The platform's data tools helped us understand and connect with customers personally, boosting engagement and loyalty efficiently. Splio saved us time and money, significantly improving our marketing impact.I used it pretty frequently to keep a track.

What do you dislike about Splio?
It did have a learning curve. While the platform is already pretty simple but it took me sometime to train my interns on it.

What problems is Splio solving and how is that benefiting you?
Email workflows and post sign up journey communication.
